metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10033 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The mailSend function in the isMail transport in PHPMailer before 5.2.18might allow remote attackers to pass extra parameters to the mail commandand consequently execute arbitrary code via a \" (backslash double quote)in a crafted Sender property.

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
